name: Minnie
description: '''Nicha Yontararak''' ({{langx|th|ณิชา ยนตรรักษ์}}; born {{birth date|1997|10|23}}), known professionally as '''Minnie''' ({{Korean|hangul=민니}}; {{Langx|th|มินนี่}}), is a Thai singer, songwriter, record producer, and actress based in South Korea. She is a member of South Korean girl group [[I-dle]], which debuted as (G)I-dle on May 2, 2018 under [[Cube Entertainment]]. Minnie made her solo debut with the extended play ''[[Her (Minnie EP)|Her]]'' on January 21, 2025.
